data_table.description: Interstitial Lung Abnormalities (acquired from round 2 CT scans), Offspring and Generation 3 Cohorts, CT scans performed between 9/2008 to 3/2011. A subset of the Offspring and Generation 3 cohorts underwent gated whole lung CT imaging with the primary goal of assessing coronary artery calcification.

variable.name: ctdate
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since Exam 1.
